participants.name: Mo Akram
participants.title: Industry recognized leader in Human Capital Solutions & Talent Strategy

messages.message:
Hope all is well - Come join Freshly's Engineering Team - disrupting the tech space in NY

Hi Brian, 

Hope all is well. I head up Freshly's Talent Acquisition team and I came across your profile and love to have an exploratory conversation regarding your areas of expertise. 

We are looking for an experienced Ruby on Rails Full Stack Web Developer to join our core, rapidly growing, engineering team at our brand new office in Phoenix, AZ. You will be part of building the Freshly platform and shaping the companyâ€™s future.

We are a fully vertically integrated business: we source our own ingredients and we prepare, cook assemble and ship hundreds of thousands of meals per week to 28 US states. We employ 50 people in our HQ in NY and more than 250 people nationally. We recently raised our $21MM series B lead by Insight Ventures, with the objective of expanding our operations to all 50 states and become the technological leaders in the sector.

Mo Akram | Head of Talent Acquisition

mo.akram@freshly.com
917.444.6262
